channel.title: doxygen Tutorial on

item.title: Getting started with doxygen
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting doxygen set up or installed. Commenting your code # There are several ways to mark a comment block as a detailed description, so that this comment block is parsed by Doxygen and added as a description of the following code item to the documentation. The first and most common one are C style comments with an extra asterisk in the comment start sequence, e.
